item.title: Car Hire
item.dc:creator: Ning
item.content:encoded:
• Edit

Car Rental Yogyakarta

  • Edit

Cheap Car Rental Yogyakarta

Indoscooterhire also offers car hire at an affordable price.

In Yogyakarta there are alot of people who ride a scooter, so many in fact it is often called the city of scooters. For the new visitor to the area, this may seem daunting and a little scary to hop on a scooter.

The safer and easier option is to rent a car and have a driver take you to explore in air conditioned comfort.

We have 2 models to choose from, a Toyota Avanza or Innova.

Price includes an English speaking driver, 12 hours car rental and a full tank of petrol

Book a car today and we will pick you up directly from your hotel.

Having a guide is very helpfull when visiting places. A tour guide can suggest other options to explore away from the crowds.

If you would like to include a guide, let us know and we will have it arranged. The cost of a guide for the day is usually 100,000IDR.

  • Edit
Book Now
  • Edit
  • Edit
  • Edit
  • Edit

Toyota Avanza

The Toyota Avanza is a great option to explore Yogyakarta in. This Car can easily accomodate 4 people.

  • Edit
  • Edit

600,000IDR/Day

  • Edit
Book It
  • Edit
  • Edit

Toyota Innova

The Toyota Innova is larger than the Avanza, which gives more space if you have luggage to carry. This Car can accomodate 6 people.

  • Edit
  • Edit

800,000IDR/Day

  • Edit
Book It
  • Edit

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
• Edit

Time To Explore

Indoscooterhire has the latest model Honda scooters available for you to explore Yogyakarta

  • Edit
Book Now
  • Edit

Scooter rental made easy.

At Indoscooterhire, we make motorbike rental in Yogyakarta a simple and easy process.
Choose from 3 different model Hondas and start exploring today, you will be glad that you did.

Hop on a scooter and escape to tropical and mystical places. Discover the hidden gems of the area, explore beautiful locations, beaches, volcanos, temples and escape the crowds.

All you need for scooter hire in Jogja, is a valid drivers licence. We also ask for a copy of your passport and entry stamp into Indonesia.

Click Here to reserve your scooter today.

  • Edit
  • Edit

The Reliable Honda

  • Edit
  • Edit

Honda Beat 110cc

Meet the Honda Beat. A fuel friendly scooter with style to match. Our most popular rental with a sleek and comfortable design.

  • Edit
  • Edit

IDR 80,000/day

  • Edit
Book It
  • Edit
  • Edit

Honda Vario 125cc

Cool outside and Smart inside. A great option for the longer journeys. This Scooter can handle the hills.

  • Edit
  • Edit

IDR 80,000/day

  • Edit
Book It
  • Edit
  • Edit

Honda Vario 150cc

Our biggest scooter available to hire. Although a bit more petrol thirsty, it is better suited for two people.   

  • Edit
  • Edit

IDR 80,000/day

  • Edit
Book It
  • Edit

Introducing M'bak Ning. She is the star behind the succes of Indoscooterhire.

M'bak Ning handles all the bookings, assigns the scooters and manages the day to day operations. 

She is fluent in French, English, Dutch and Indonesian languages, which makes for effective communication between our clients from all over the world.

  • Edit

Meet the man who is responsible for the maintenance, safety and reliabilty of your scooter. He makes sure your scooter is looking pristine and ready to go. 

Mas Ruckman has been with Indoscooterhire from day one and always has the scooters serviced and ready for you to explore.

The man for the job!

  • Edit

Our Office Location

  • Edit

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Our website address is: https://indoscooterhire.com.

What personal data we collect and why we collect it

Comments

When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Contact forms

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you have an account and you log in to this site, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Analytics

Who we share your data with

How long we retain your data

If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

Your contact information

Additional information

How we protect your data

What data breach procedures we have in place

What third parties we receive data from

What automated decision making and/or profiling we do with user data

Industry regulatory disclosure requirements

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Time To Explore

Indoscooterhire has the latest model Honda scooters available for you to explore Yogyakarta

Book Now

Scooter rental made easy.

At Indoscooterhire, we make motorbike rental in Yogyakarta a simple and easy process.
Choose from 3 different model Hondas and start exploring today, you will be glad that you did.

Hop on a scooter and escape to tropical and mystical places. Discover the hidden gems of the area, explore beautiful locations, beaches, volcanos, temples and escape the crowds.

All you need for scooter hire in Jogja, is a valid drivers licence. We also ask for a copy of your passport and entry stamp into Indonesia.

Click Here to reserve your scooter today.

The Reliable Honda

Honda Beat 110cc

Meet the Honda Beat. A fuel friendly scooter with style to match. Our most popular rental with a sleek and comfortable design.

IDR 80,000/day

Book It

Honda Vario 125cc

Cool outside and Smart inside. A great option for the longer journeys. This Scooter can handle the hills.

IDR 80,000/day

Book It

Honda Vario 150cc

Our biggest scooter available to hire. Although a bit more petrol thirsty, it is better suited for two people.   

IDR 80,000/day

Book It

Introducing M'bak Ning. She is the star behind the succes of Indoscooterhire.

M'bak Ning handles all the bookings, assigns the scooters and manages the day to day operations. 

She is fluent in French, English, Dutch and Indonesian languages, which makes for effective communication between our clients from all over the world.

Meet the man who is responsible for the maintenance, safety and reliabilty of your scooter. He makes sure your scooter is looking pristine and ready to go. 

Mas Ruckman has been with Indoscooterhire from day one and always has the scooters serviced and ready for you to explore.

The man for the job!

Our Office Location

Scooter Rental Rates

Indoscooterhire- The best place to rent a scooter/motorbike in Yogyakarta indonesia

Indoscooterhire Price Guide

Choose to have your rental scooter in Yogyakarta delivered directly to your accomodation within the Prawirotoman tourist precinct (free of charge) or pick-up from our office.

Indoscooterhire is the best place to rent a scooter/motorbike in Yogyakarta, Indonesia. We make renting a motorbike hassle free. You will be provided with a quality scooter at a great price. Choose to hire daily, for the weekend, weekly or monthly.

item.title: Services
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Our Services

Our Services

Indoscooterhire makes exploring Central Java a pleasure with our latest model Honda Scooters.

Trust and a strong commitment to customer satisfaction is what you can expect from Jogja's leading scooter rental company.

We are located in the Prawirotaman area, of Yogyakarata. Which is close to many cafes/restaurants/bars, tour agents and accomodation options.

Apart from Scooter hire, we can also provide:

  • Car rental
  • Laundry service. Our Scooter hire office is also a laundromat. We offer express (same day cleaned and ironed) or regular  washing (2-3 days). A 10% discount applies to our scooter rental customers.
  • Storage facilities. We can safely store your bulky luggage, to lighten the load when you want to explore on a scooter.
"Indoscooterhire are a pleasure to deal with." Roberto(Italy) School Teacher

Great Service

Strong commitment to customer satisfaction..

Honda Scooters

Reliable, latest model motors

Laundry Service

Washing professionally cleaned and ironed.

Car Rental

Travel in A/C comfort

Storage Facility

Safely secure and store luggage

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k4e2xKUaBKE

There are many fascinating places to visit in Yogyakarta. Have a look at our blog page to get some tips and ideas of the places that Yogya has to offer.

item.title: Scooterhire
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Indoscooterhire

Terms and conditions

The Fine Print

Scooter Rental Terms

Your premium select motorbike will be presented clean, with a full tank of petrol, poncho/raincoat and it will have undergone a comprehensive safety check on brakes, lights, indicators, tyre pressure and 9 more key points.

Clean and sanitised helmet(s) is included.

  • A valid drivers licence
  • A copy of Passport and entry stamp into Indonesia
  • A security deposit of 500,000Rp
  • Person who rents the scooter must be aged between 18-71
  • Scooter to be used in Central Java only, unless prior arrangements have been made.
  • No Insurance (you will be fully responsible for any damage to the motorbike)
  • Scooter to be returned with a full tank of petrol. (If not full, a surcharge of 30,000Rp is payable)
  • Return of scooter after agreed time will incure an extra days rental charge
Book Now

item.title: Car Hire
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Car Rental Yogyakarta

Cheap Car Rental Yogyakarta

Indoscooterhire also offers car hire at an affordable price.

In Yogyakarta there are alot of people who ride a scooter, so many in fact it is often called the city of scooters. For the new visitor to the area, this may seem daunting and a little scary to hop on a scooter.

The safer and easier option is to rent a car and have a driver take you to explore in air conditioned comfort.

We have 2 models to choose from, a Toyota Avanza or Innova.

Price includes an English speaking driver, 12 hours car rental and a full tank of petrol

Book a car today and we will pick you up directly from your hotel.

Having a guide is very helpfull when visiting places. A tour guide can suggest other options to explore away from the crowds.

If you would like to include a guide, let us know and we will have it arranged. The cost of a guide for the day is usually 100,000IDR.

Book Now

Toyota Avanza

The Toyota Avanza is a great option to explore Yogyakarta in. This Car can easily accomodate 4 people.

600,000IDR/Day

Book It

Toyota Innova

The Toyota Innova is larger than the Avanza, which gives more space if you have luggage to carry. This Car can accomodate 6 people.

800,000IDR/Day

Book It

item.title: Laundry
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Ningsu Laundry

Cleaned, ironed and smell Fresh.

Ningsu Laundry Service

Within the Indoscooterhire office, we run a laundry.

This service has proved popular with our customers, especially during the rainy season when drying clothes is difficult.

We provide a professional service, where you can be assured that your clothes will be washed in clean water(filtered) = NO STAINS.

We use an eco-friendly laundry detergent to help minimise the effect on the environment.

A great deal of care is taken to look after your valuable items. If any items are lost we will refund you in rupiah, the equilivant cost of the item.

Only your washing is placed in the machine and we do not bundle it in with other peoples laundry.

Choose from hot or cold water options, air/sun  or tumble dried. There are two different fragrances that we use to have your laundry smelling fresh.

We offer express same day cleaning(within 4-12 hours) and a regular service (1, 2 or 3 days). Leave your dirty clothes with us and when you return from exploring, they will be cleaned, ironed and smelling fresh, ready for your next adventure.

All of our scooter hire customers recieve a 10% discount.

Pick-up and drop off to your hotel is available free of charge in the Prawirotamen area, for laundry and scooter hire.

Contact us now and we will come and collect it straight away.

Ningsu Laundry is open from 7.00am until 7.00pm 7 days per week.

Collect Laundry

Our Location

item.title: Storage
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Indoscooterhire Storage

Lighten your load

Storage Facility

Do you need to lighten your load when you hire a scooter to explore?

Do you have larger items like surfboards, golfclubs or large suitcases that need to be stored for a period of time?

No worries, we have storage facilities available for you to keep your belongings safe and secure.

The Storage room is locked at all times which is monitored 24 hours, 7 days a week by CCTV surveillance cameras, also patrolled by night time security.

For as little as 20,000Rp per day, you can have your items safely stored with us.

To find out more or reserve your storage space, click the link below.

Storage Please

item.title: Majestical Borobodor
item.dc:creator: Ning
item.content:encoded: The majestical borobodur temple is the largest hindu monument in the world. Take a scooter ride or book a car and have us take you there in air conditioned comfort. Do a sunrise tour and experience at it's most amazing site!
item.excerpt:encoded: The stunning Borobodur temple is best seen at sunrise.

item.title: Merapi Volcano
item.dc:creator: Ning
item.content:encoded: Go on a scooter ride to the magnifcant Merapi volcano. This is the most active volcanoe on the Indonesian archepeligo.

item.title: Candi Prambanan Temple
item.dc:creator: Ning
item.content:encoded:
Candi Prambanan is a 9th century Hindu Temple compound in central Java, Indonesia. Dedicated to the Trimunti, the expression of God as the creator, the preserver and the destroyer.
One of the few temples in the world that has a Brahma statue.
Definitely worth a visit when in Yogyakarta.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Who We Are

At indoscooterhire.com, we are committed to maintaining the trust and confidence of all visitors to our web site. In particular, we want you to know that indoscooterhire.com is not in the business of selling, renting or trading email lists with other companies and businesses for marketing purposes. In this Privacy Policy, we’ve provided detailed information on when and why we collect personal information, how we use it, the limited conditions under which we may disclose it to others, and how we keep it secure. We take your privacy seriously and take measures to provide all visitors and users of indoscooterhire.com with a safe and secure environment.

Cookies

indoscooterhire.com may set and access indoscooterhire.com cookies on your computer.  Cookies are used to provide our system with the basic information to provide the services you are requesting.  Cookies can be cleared at any time from your internet browser settings.

Google Analytics

When someone visits indoscooterhire.com we use a third party service, Google Analytics, to collect standard internet log information and details of visitor behaviour patterns. We do this to track things such as the number of visitors to the various parts of the site and interactions with the site. This information is processed in a way which does not identify anyone. We do not make, and do not allow Google to make, any attempt to find out the identities of visitors to our website.

Website Comments

When someone visits indoscooterhire.com, there may be an ability to submit comments on particular articles or pages.  When comments are submitted, you are entitled to use aliases or information that completely hides your identity. When a comment is submitted, the relevant details (name, email, website) that you provide are stored.  These details are stored so that we can display your comment back to you, and to anyone viewing the comment sections on the site. We do not verify information entered nor do we require verification.

Third Parties

There may be some circumstances where your IP address, geographic location, and other browser related details may be shared with third party companies.  We may share your above mentioned data with following third party companies from time to time.

Access to Your Personal Information

You are entitled to view, amend, or delete the personal information that we hold. Email your request to our data protection officer Ning at info@indoscooterhire.com and we will work with you to remove any of your personal data we may have.

Changes to Our Privacy Policy

We may make changes to our Privacy Policy in the future, however, the most current version of the policy will govern our processing of your personal data and will always be available to you. If we make a change to this policy that, in our sole discretion, is material, we will notify you by an update or email, where possible. By continuing to access or use our services, you agree to be bound to the terms of our Privacy Policy.

item.title: Borobudur Indonesia - A Day Trip From Yogyakarta
item.dc:creator: Ning
item.content:encoded:
Borobudur Indonesia is a popular tourist attraction and on many peoples bucket list.

It is located in the Magelang Regency about one hour drive from Yogyakarta. Almost 3 million people visit the Stupa every year.

To properly explore the Borobudur Temple compounds, I would recommend allocating a day trip from Yogyakarta.

Although it's possible to visit Borobudur in the morning and explore other places, like the Merapi volcano or Prambanan Temple in the afternoon, it will make for an exhausting day.

But of course if time is limited it is possible to do more than just see Borobudur from Yogyakarta in one day.

Borobudur from Yogyakarta

There are two routes you can take to get to Borobudur from Yogyakarta.

The direct route uses the main road (Jalan Magelang) then cuts across to the Temple. The second, less direct route, by way of Jalan Wates, goes through the villages and rice paddies of Central Java.

If you plan on seeing Borobudur at sunrise, I would suggest taking the direct route first, as it will be dark and hard to see the country side, then take the back road, past the rice paddies and villages, stopping for lunch at the Plataran Resort on the way back into town. This is a 5 star resort with excellent dining and an amazing setting looking back towards Borobudur.

Although this longer option will take more time, the views are worth it.

An organized tour will only take you on the main road, but if you get a private car rental, you will have more flexibility as to where you go and what you can see. After all it's your holiday, so you might as well take your time to relax and experience what the area has to offer.

About Borobudur - Indonesia

This amazing Temple is recognized as the largest Buddhist monument in the world.

It is a world heritage listed site by UNESCO and is rated at number 3 by National Geographic, after Machu Picchu in Peru and Petra in Jordan, as the worlds most iconic adventures worth the effort to see.

It was built around 700AD by the Sailendra dynasty, which ruled Central Java at the time. They hand carved some 2 million stone blocks over 75 years and placed them to form the stupa on 9 platforms, 6 square and 3 circular around a hill, topped with a central dome.

It was used as a sacred place to pay respects to Buddha and as a pilgrimage spot to guide mankind from worldly desires into enlightenment and wisdom, up until the 10th to 15th Century when it was abandoned.

There are many theories as to why it was abandoned, it may have been as the new powers of Java shifted away from Buddhism and converted to Islam, or because it is built between 2 volcanoes and a major eruption may have been enough to abandon the area.

Whatever the reason being, it lay hidden beneath volcanic ash and jungle up until 1814. During this time, Java was under British rule and it was bought to international attention when it was re-discovered by the governor Sir Tomas Stamford Raffles.

During this time it has undergone several restorations to bring it back to its former glory. The largest restoration project commenced in 1975, by the Indonesian government and UNESCO and in 1991 was listed as a world heritage site.

Current Day Borobudur Indonesia

Borobudur is the most visited attraction in Indonesia and is still used by Buddhists as a pilgrimage.

Every year thousands of Buddhists gather at the temple to celebrate the most holy event, Vesak, (Buddha's birthday). This series of rituals and ceremonies happens annually during the full moon in May.

The pinnacle of the Vesak ritual is the lighting of 1000 Puja lanterns, which are released into the night sky, symbolizing enlightenment for the entire universe.

This is a spectacular experience and one that is highly recommended if you happen to be visiting Yogyakarta during this time.

The popularity of the Borobudur Temple Compounds, unfortunately has made it highly commercialized and to a degree compromised the spiritual atmosphere of the site. This is more so on weekends when it is crowded and noisy, particularly with local Indonesian families and children who love taking selfies and practicing their English-speaking skills with tourists.

Associated Costs Visiting Borobudur - Indonesia.

Almost 3 Million people come to Borobudur each year and gets busy on weekends, particularly with locals.

It is best to visit Borobudur from Yogyakarta early, arriving before the crowds get there. Gates open at 6.00am or buy a sunrise ticket, which allows you entry into Borobudur at 4.30am.

The cost is $25USD for regular admission, (6.00am until 5.00pm) or $40USD for the sunrise ticket. It is open every day, including public holidays.

Having a guide is very helpful if you want to gain more knowledge of the temple. You will learn interesting facts and have in depth discussions. A guide costs 100,000IDR.

Although I think the entry cost is a little expensive, Borobudur is a World Heritage listed site and a great deal of effort has gone into restoring this majestical temple. It is not every day you will experience something like this, which makes the expense a little more justified.
